what: Plotting tools for evaluating Coho run reconstructions
title: Plotting tools for evaluating Coho run reconstructions
text: goal rrViewer assist QA/QC [Coho] run reconstruction process FRAM team WDFW.

title: Plotting tools for evaluating Coho run reconstructions
text: can install development version rrViewer GitHub :

title: Plotting tools for evaluating Coho run reconstructions
text: two key functions package. read_rr_trs() reads excel file run reconstruction. plot_rr_mu() plots timeseries fisheries totals given stock (identifies blocks run reconstruction excel file) management unit (rows within block). default plot_rr_mu() calcuates proportional values across fisheries given year, can also set instead present raw values excel file. list_rr_options() can used identify stock management_unit_name options making plots.
code: rr.dat = read_rr_trs(paste0(path, "/Copy of PScohoRR_TRS_2010-2023_2023-01-22 _draft.xlsx")) plot_rr_mu(rr.dat, stock.use = "South Sound", mu.use = "Nisqually River Hatchery")

title: Provide
text: run reconstruction dataframe created, nice see options stock management_unit_name identifiers making plots. function acts wrapper unique(data$stock) stock name provided; stock name provided, instead wrapper filtering stock unique(data$management_unit_name. presenting management unit names, removes astrixes; consistent plot_rr_mu() behavior.

title: Plot timeseries of values for a given management unit. — plot_rr_mu
text: data Dataframe generated read_rr_trs() stock.use Character string stock name (identify blocks within run reconstruction excel file) plot. Use list_rr_options() see options. mu.use Character string "management_unit_name" (identify rows within block run reconstruction excel file) plot. Use list_rr_options() see options. Matches versions management unit name without astrices, used add notes treated new versions management unit. normalize_fisheries Logical: calues fisheries turned % stock's catch per fishery year (TRUE) presented raw values (FALSE). Defaults TRUE. base_font_size Integer passed theme_bw() set baseline font size figures. Defaults 13.

title: Plot timeseries of values for a given management unit. — plot_rr_mu
text: Figure object made ggplots combined using {patchwork}.

what: Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
title: Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
text: RR sheets organized blocks – one left, usually also one right – stock. block management units rows fisheries columns, summary columns summary rows. function translates longform; see details. function designed robust addition subtraction rows columns within blocks, additions new blocks "Return Year" second column, first row "Wild" final row, first column. However, changes number columns left right blocks (e.g., shifting black separator column N something else) break function. However, appears typically addressed creating "continued" block blocks exceed number columns. combine_continued argument controls handling blocks.

title: Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
text: path Run reconstruction file combine_continued Logical: "continued" type blocks combined? Defaults TRUE.

title: Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
text: tibble run reconstruction long form. See details.

title: Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
text: translate block compatible longform dataframes, add several identifiers. $stock identifies stock use, year sheetname identify datasheet data comes , block identifies whether data comes right left blocks, management_unit_name col_name identify row column identifiers within block. columns right-hand blocks sometimes include super-columns (e.g., "Stillaguamish/Snohomish" "Aggregate Totals", "Stillaguamish Origin", Snohomish Origin"). col_name_super identifies . given block stock value. also specieal block "Ar 13D Net CWT..." columns P-Q.

title: Read and format run reconstruction — read_rr_trs
